verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mfanyieni shangwe Dunia yote
na mtumikieni kwa furaha.*2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1.Njooni mbele za Bwana kwa kuimba
jueni kwamba yeye ndiye Mungu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2.Alituumba tuko watu wake
jueni kwamba yeye ndiye Mungu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3.Piteni milangoni kwa shukrani
daima himidini jina lake.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
4.Mtukuzeni Baba pia Mwana
na Roho mtakatifu siku zote.
